trans-unit.source: Here you can add the video/audio file or multiple files if you are using different codecs. If your video file is heavy, use Youtube instead
Crop the picture as a circle
Tick to force the element to take all screen height
Tick to force the element to take all screen width
Viewport's width for the picture, limited to page body width for the content
Content type to use in the modal
If desired, add css classes to the element
Use this field to program a custom script
Modal name, optional. Used to identify the modal in a custom script
Check to load modal content in background
Check to destroy the modal when closing it
Check to add a button to refresh the content of the modal
Generate an accordion and configure its elements
Tick to automatically deploy all elements
Tick to disable deploy/collapse actions (automatically deploy all elements)
Tick to automatically collapse other elements when one is deployed
Tick to make the element always visible (disable deploy/collapse actions)
Tick to make the element automatically deployed on page load
Definez the number of decimals for the counter (0 by default)
Define animation duration in seconds (2 by default)
Define a delay before the counter animation starts in seconds (0 by default)
Define the unit which will be display aside the counter (example: m²)
Define a short text which will be displayed under the counter
Generate an element composed of a text over an image
Type one or more CSS classes to add to the link (separated by space)
Generate an element composed of a text over an image
Generate an element composed of a text over an image
Generate a gallery dedicated to display logos
Generate an icons list paired with text
Choose the type of image to display in the block
If desired, define a background color for the icon
Type the text to be displayed under the icon
If desired, add one or more CSS classes to the item
Type a short text to be displayed after the rating
Select the PDF file to display
Define if the file can be downloaded
Define a display ratio for the player (responsive)
Center the player in the page (work only if a width as been defined)
Generate a list of price cards
Define the price tag position in blocks
Choose the type of content displayed in the block
Define a background color for all blocks in the list
Define a font color for all blocks in the list
If desired, add one or more CSS classes to the button
Define a background color for this block alone
Define a font color for this block alone
Set the block as a main block
If filled, add a very noticeable label, making this bloc stand out from the others
Add css classes to the label
Generate a quote block, with or without picture
Choose the picture position (on the left/right side of the quote)
If desired, enter the quote's author
Generate a slider and configure your pictures
Configure the slider height. Default height is relative to the slider content.
Indicate the number of objects to display per slide
Check to make the slider plays automatically
Check to make the slider start over when finished
Choose the desired transition type between slides
Set the execution time of the transitions (ms)
Set the time interval between each transition (ms)
Check to activate navigation throught arrows (disable classic navigation)
Check to enable navigation throught swipe
Check to enable navigation throught keyboard
Insert thhe background image for this item
If needed, adjust the text font color
Type one or more CSS classes to add to the link (separated by space)
Generate a group of deployable tabs
Generate a slider to show testimonials/quotes
Check to make the contents slide automatically
Tick to replace navigation by lateral arrows
Insert a background image for this element
If desired, add one or more CSS classes to add to the author's block
Choose a style to apply to the timeline
Change the titles and years colors
Insert an image to illustrate your timeline
Select the illustration position, on the timeline's right or left
If desired, type a title for this date
Type the text to display for this date
Generate a conten block composed of a text and an image
Select a predefined and peculiar style for the block
CSS class(es) to add to the image
CSS class(es) to add to the title
CSS class(es) to add to the text
CSS class(es) to add to the link
Change the way the picture will be displayed in the block
Configure a header for the site (logo, navigation, contact, etc.)
Text to display if the logo is not displayable
Add free content displayed beside the logo
Choose the module used for navigation
Choose the module used for navigation
If checked, the header will stay fixed on top of the page while scrolling
Add a search field to the far end of the navigation
Select the page where to redirect the user on submit
Select the search block background color
Define the name of the argument used by the search engine
Add a lang selector to the far end of the navigation
Select the langage block background color
Add free content displayed in a bar placed on top of the header
Add free content displayed at the far end of the navigation
Defines the side on which the mobile navigation will be displayed
Choose the appearance of the demarcation between header and page content
Choose the appearance of the hover effect on menu items
